nodes.text: Loje Nella was a female Riorian who was a member of Jabba Desilijic Tiure's criminal empire. In 4 ABY, Nella was present when Leia Organa was caught while trying to free Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt on Tatooine. She stood near members of the Max Rebo Band, including Droopy McCool and Max Rebo. Nella had brown eyes and skin.
